document_data.name: Brennan Risling
document_data.mainbody:
'''Brennan Risling''' was an [[adventurer]] lived in [[west Faerûn]] during the mid–14{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{quote|''That's it. I'm not dying for your simple stupidity, Mencar. Brennan Risling has better things to do than court your arrogant pride...''|Brennan Risling}}
document_data.Relationships: As an adventurer, Brennan traveled alongside the [[dwarf]] [[Mencar Pebblecrusher]], the [[barbarian]] [[Smaeluv Orcslicer]], as well as [[Amon (mage)|Amon]] and his [[imp]] [[familiar]] [[Pooky]].
document_data.Possessions: Among Brennan's possessions was the unique [[ring of invisibility]], the ''[[sandthief's ring]]''.
document_data.History:
As of the {{YearlinkName|1368}}, Brennan was still living the city of [[Baldur's Gate]]. During the [[iron crisis]] he believed that [[Sarevok Anchev]] would make a fine [[Grand Duke]] and prevent war from coming to the city.

At some point during the following year, he traveled south to [[Amn]] and joined up with his adventuring band .
